source.name: Sebastian Crowe's Terror in Tierhaven
source.author: Dungeon Dudes, Monty Martin & Kelly McLaughlin
source.description:
Terror in Tierhaven is an adventure compatible with 5th Edition Dungeons and Dragons. Designed by the Dungeon Dudes, Monty Martin & Kelly McLaughlin this adventure is an introductory adventure to the World of Drakkenheim.
Appropriate for 2nd-to 4th-level player characters, characters will confront the terrible horrors wrought by just a single shard of Delerium. Confront aberrant creatures, wield powerful spells and avoid corruption at all costs as you fight to save the town of Tierhaven.
In this adventure you will find:
New aberrant monsters for 5th edition Contaminated spells
